qa_pair.answer: The answer depends on current inventory — use inStock field from search results

qa_pair.question: How many tools does the pantry-agent MCP server expose? List them.
qa_pair.answer: 6: search_products, get_product, find_stores, get_store, add_to_cart, get_profile
